targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(1)
FROM Alert
WHERE
  startsAt BETWEEN DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from:date:seconds}),INTERVAL 8 HOUR) AND DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to:date:seconds}),INTERVAL 8 HOUR)
  AND status="firing"

SELECT
  startsAt AS time,
  status,
  ID
FROM Alert
WHERE
  startsAt BETWEEN DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from:date:seconds}),INTERVAL 8 HOUR) AND DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to:date:seconds}),INTERVAL 8 HOUR)
  AND status="firing"
ORDER BY startsAt

SELECT
	AlertID AS "ID",
	Value AS "severity"
FROM
	AlertLabel
WHERE
	AlertID IN (
	SELECT
		ID 
	FROM
		Alert 
	WHERE
	  startsAt BETWEEN DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from:date:seconds}),INTERVAL 8 HOUR) AND DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to:date:seconds}),INTERVAL 8 HOUR)
	  AND status="firing"
	)
	AND Label="severity"

SELECT
  COUNT(1)
FROM Alert
WHERE
  startsAt BETWEEN DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from:date:seconds}),INTERVAL 8 HOUR) AND DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to:date:seconds}),INTERVAL 8 HOUR)
  AND status="resolved"

SELECT
  startsAt AS time,
  status,
  ID
FROM Alert
WHERE

SELECT
  startsAt AS time,
  ID
FROM Alert
WHERE
  startsAt BETWEEN DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from:date:seconds}),INTERVAL 8 HOUR) AND DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to:date:seconds}),INTERVAL 8 HOUR)

SELECT
  startsAt AS time,
  ID
FROM Alert
WHERE
  startsAt BETWEEN DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from:date:seconds}),INTERVAL 8 HOUR) AND DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to:date:seconds}),INTERVAL 8 HOUR)
  AND status="resolved"
ORDER BY startsAt

SELECT
  ID,
  status,
  startsAt,
  endsAt,
  TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, startsAt, UTC_TIMESTAMP()) AS duration,
  fingerprint
FROM Alert
WHERE
  startsAt BETWEEN DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from:date:seconds}),INTERVAL 8 HOUR) AND DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to:date:seconds}),INTERVAL 8 HOUR)
ORDER BY ID

SELECT
	AlertID AS "ID",
	Value AS "alertname"
FROM
	AlertLabel
WHERE
	AlertID IN (
	SELECT
		ID 
	FROM
		Alert 
	WHERE
	  startsAt BETWEEN DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(${__from:date:seconds}),INTERVAL 8 HOUR) AND DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(${__to:date:seconds}),INTERVAL 8 HOUR)
	)
	AND Label="alertname"
